title: ****9/1 SOUTH END-TREMONT TOP FLOOR 1BED-IN-UNIT W/D & HUGE ROOF DECK!
posting_body: AVAILABLE 09/01/2022
Renovated Top Floor one bedroom unit in the heart of the South End.
The unit comes with hardwood floors, granite countertops, ample size bedroom, large private deck and in unit laundry.
Walk to everything the South End has to offer with its' many restaurants, activities, and public transportation.
Great back bay views, 3rd floor walkup.
Available Sept 2022
Please email Ben with any questions or to schedule a viewing of the property!
